snippet: Mr. Murray brings his strong, smooth baritone to the Metropolitan Room in a performance directed by the pianist Alex Rybeck.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by singer Todd Murray and quartet led by pianist Alex Rybeck at Metropolitan Room.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Murray brings his strong, smooth baritone to the Metropolitan Room in a performance directed by the pianist Alex Rybeck.

headline.main: Review: Todd Murray’s ‘Croon,’ Caresses Woven From Music and Lyrics
headline.print_headline: Caresses Woven From Music and Lyrics
